metadata.title: CVE-2018-4386 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 12.1, tvOS 12.1,watchOS 5.1, Safari 12.0.1, iTunes 12.9.1, iCloud for Windows 7.8.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4386` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-5.0 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-webkit2-5.0 - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-5.0-0 - 2.22.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-5.0-0 - 2.22.3-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.22.3-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
